name: Heliogen, Inc.
description: Heliogen, Inc. is a renewable energy technology company focused on harnessing solar energy to reduce reliance on fossil fuels. Founded in 2013 and based in Pasadena, California, Heliogen has developed a groundbreaking solar technology that uses advanced computer vision software to reflect sunlight onto a single target, achieving extremely high temperatures. This innovative approach enables the generation of low-cost, carbon-free energy that can be used for various applications, including industrial processes that traditionally rely on natural gas. Heliogen’s mission is to make renewable energy the most cost-effective energy source globally, with the aim of combating climate change and creating a sustainable energy future. The company is particularly notable for its partnership with major corporations and its commitment to scaling up its technology through various projects. Heliogen aims to support industries in their transition to clean energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions significantly. By providing solutions that integrate solar energy into existing infrastructures, Heliogen is positioned as a leader in the solar thermal technology sector, promoting innovation and sustainability across different industries.
